machine_end_gcode.default_value:
;End GCode
(******* End.gcode 192 Dual*******)
M104 S0 T0 ( Cool down the Right Extruder )
M104 S0 T1 ( Cool down the Left Extruder )
M140 S0 T0
G1 Z190 F1000 (Send Z axis to bottom of machine )
G162 X Y F2500 ( Home XY endstops )
M18 ( Disable stepper motors )
M72 P1  ( Play Ta-Da song )
M73 P100 ( End  build progress )
(*********end End.gcode*******)

machine_start_gcode.default_value:
(**** start.gcode for F192****)
M136
G21 (set units to mm)
G90 (set positioning to absolute)
(**** begin homing ****)
G162 X Y F2000 (home XY axes maximum)
G92 X160 Y107.5 Z0 A0 B0
G1 X72.5 Y103.5 F1800
G1 Z-20 F500
G161 Z F1000 (home Z axis minimum)
G92 Z-2.1
G1 Z5 F1800 
G161 Z F100
G92 Z-2.1
G1 Z5 F1800
G162 X Y F2500
(**** end homing ****)
G92 X145 Y105 Z5 A0 B0 
G1 Z50 F3300.0 (move to waiting position)
M6 T0 (wait for toolhead, and HBP to reach temperature)
M108 T0
G1 X115 Y-86 Z0.270 F2000.000
G1 X15 Y-86 Z0.270 F1000.000 E25.000
G92 E0
(**** end of start.gcode ****)
T{initial_extruder_nr}
